main.description: Enable an aggregator for a community. Creates an authorization record in the community's repository. Requires moderator permissions.

community.description: DID or handle of the community

aggregatorDid.description: DID of the aggregator to enable

config.description: Aggregator-specific configuration. Must conform to the aggregator's configSchema.

uri.description: AT-URI of the created authorization record

cid.description: CID of the created authorization record

errors.name: NotAuthorized
errors.description: Caller is not a moderator of this community

errors.name: AggregatorNotFound
errors.description: Aggregator DID does not exist or has no service declaration

errors.name: InvalidConfig
errors.description: Config does not match aggregator's configSchema

errors.name: AlreadyEnabled
errors.description: Aggregator is already enabled for this community
